channel.title: Help Please

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I need two things, one is a shortbow\longbow model for 317, my cache got messed up. Another thing is that when I run my client on Linux or something else it will load up, but some of the images don’t show up. I’m using 317 Delta client. public static final String findcachedir(){ return String.format("%s/%s/", System.getProperty("user.home"), ".SageScape_file_store_32"); }
And with all of the stuff that’s searching for the cache:

That’s an example of something that doesn’t load. A lot of stuff loads, but not everything, like the tab icons, or some buttons, and the compass. Any help please?

Read full topic
